meanings.definition: The branch of technology and industry concerned with both aviation and space flight.
meanings.sent1: Many engineers work in aerospaces to design airplanes and rockets.
meanings.sent2: The aerospaces industry is constantly evolving with new advancements.
meanings.sent3: In the world of aerospaces, even the sky is not the limit!
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared into the aerospaces of creativity.
meanings.sent5: Exploring aerospaces opens up endless possibilities for innovation.

meanings.definition: The physical space above the Earth's atmosphere where aircraft and spacecraft operate.
meanings.sent1: Pilots navigate through aerospaces to reach their destinations.
meanings.sent2: Satellites orbit within the aerospaces surrounding our planet.
meanings.sent3: The aerospaces above us hold the secrets of the universe.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams traveled through the aerospaces, reaching for the stars.
meanings.sent5: The aerospaces offer a vast expanse for exploration and discovery.
